TextView.android:text: The Objective of the game is to have a higher net value than the dealer, while still being at or under 21. \nAt the start of a round, both the player and the dealer are dealt two cards, and the player can either choose to hit, which is drawing another card, or stand. If a player goes over 21, they automatically bust, which means they lose. \nAll number cards are worth their face value, and all face cards are worth 10. Ace cards can either be counter as 1 or 11.
